snippet.title: Motorcycle Translation Bloopers \- The International Business Edge - Globalization Group, Inc - ™
snippet.description: Saturday January 12th 2013. A small scandal-that-never-really-was erupted when motorcycle racer Nicky Hayden's remarks were mistranslated last week. Hayden had commented that "it is a shame" (meaning "it is a pity") fellow racer Casey Stoner is leaving the Ducati team for the Honda team in 2011.

snippet.title: Vatican Translation Blooper Reel - The Curt Jester
snippet.description: Punditry, Prayer, Parody, Polemics, Puns from a Papist Perspective. Recommended and other links. Maybe I am missing something, but I think there is something wrong here. This is also a commitment of the New Evangelization in the times of an economic crisis that are cutting funds for health care.
